roleset.name: shore up a river bank

role.descr: agent, entity building or deciding to build a wharf

roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added because none existed. Member of Vncls 9.9. Comparison to ‘roof’. Roleset by Julia.

example.name: All args
example.text: They wharfed the narrow channel with a wall of a brick to keep the bank from falling in.
example.arg: to keep the bank from falling in.

roleset.name: leave at a wharf

role.descr: agent, entity dropping off the goods

roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added because none existed. Member of Vncls 9.10. Comparison to ‘warehouse’. Roleset by Julia.

roleset.name: dock at a wharf
roleset.note: Roleset based on internet search. Added because none existed. Member of Vncls 9.1-1. Comparison to ‘dock’. Roleset by Julia.

example.name: All args
example.text: They wharfed the patrol boat out front.

example.name: Theme as subject
example.text: The big ship wharfed in the evening.
